languages.text: "Тоже мне задачка. Она, поди, в койке такое выделывает, что {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость ей любой грех спустит. Впрочем, кому я объясняю..."
"That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"
languages.original_text: "Тоже мне задачка. Она, поди, в койке такое выделывает, что {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость ей любой грех спустит. Впрочем, кому я объясняю..."

traits.locale_text: "That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"
"That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"
"That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"
"That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"

languages.text: “我也有同样的疑问。或许她的床上功夫了得，舰长大人已经原谅了她的过错。这都是他们两个人的事情，哪轮得到我这个外人说三道四……？”
languages.original_text: "That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"

traits.locale_text: “我也有同样的疑问。或许她的床上功夫了得，舰长大人已经原谅了她的过错。这都是他们两个人的事情，哪轮得到我这个外人说三道四……？”

languages.text: « Je me pose la même question. Elle est peut-être tellement douée au lit que Sa Seigneurie lui pardonne toutes ses transgressions. Mais qui suis-je pour juger... ? »
languages.original_text: "That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"

traits.locale_text: « Je me pose la même question. Elle est peut-être tellement douée au lit que Sa Seigneurie lui pardonne toutes ses transgressions. Mais qui suis-je pour juger... ? »

languages.text: «Eso es lo que me pregunto yo. Quizá haga cosas en la cama que obliguen a nuestr{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a} a perdonar todas sus transgresiones, pero ¿quién sabe?...».
languages.original_text: "That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"

traits.locale_text: «Eso es lo que me pregunto yo. Quizá haga cosas en la cama que obliguen a nuestr{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a} a perdonar todas sus transgresiones, pero ¿quién sabe?...».

languages.text: 「それが不思議なのよ。おそらく彼女は、陛下ならどんな罪も許してくれるだろうとベッドで色々とやっているのでしょう。しかし、誰が何を言えるのでしょう…？」
languages.original_text: "That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"

traits.locale_text: 「それが不思議なのよ。おそらく彼女は、陛下ならどんな罪も許してくれるだろうとベッドで色々とやっているのでしょう。しかし、誰が何を言えるのでしょう…？」

languages.text: "Das frage ich mich. Vielleicht tut sie im Bett Dinge, die dafür sorgen, dass {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} ihr jeden Fehltritt verzeiht. Ich weiß es nicht ..."
languages.original_text: "That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"

traits.locale_text: "Das frage ich mich. Vielleicht tut sie im Bett Dinge, die dafür sorgen, dass {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} ihr jeden Fehltritt verzeiht. Ich weiß es nicht ..."

languages.original_text: "That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"

languages.text: "Ben de onu diyorum. Belki {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinin aklını yatakta çeliyordur. Nereden bileceğiz?.."
languages.original_text: "That is what I am wondering. Perhaps she does things in bed that mean {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} would forgive her any transgression. But who am I to say...?"
